Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Requires the department of corrections and community supervision to update its website to include a searchable database to look up persons convicted of a family offense
Summary: Requires the department of corrections and community supervision to update its website to include a searchable database to look up persons convicted of a family offense.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to requiring the department of corrections and community supervision to include a searchable database of persons convicted of family offenses on its website
